pages.text: The gohei is a ranged weapon that can be used to shoot danmaku, and it also can be used as a normal melee weapon.$(br2)When you hold the gohei and press alt to scroll the mouse wheel, you can switch the danmaku style of the shoot.
The higher power point player has, the higher damage and speed the danmaku has.$(br2)The gohei is an important tool for building a multi-block altar.

pages.title: Shoot Danmaku
pages.text: The player holds gohei to shoot danmaku
